birth_place.zh-cn: 香港新九龙深水埗通州街

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演和监制，以其独特的个人风格电影而闻名。曾三次获得香港电影金像奖最佳导演和金马奖最佳导演。
description.en: A Hong Kong film director and producer, known for his distinctive and stylistic films. He has won the Hong Kong Film Award for Best Director and the Golden Horse Award for Best Director three times each.

description.zh-cn: 杜琪峰的妻子。
description.en: The wife of Johnnie To.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港新九龙的地区，是杜琪峰的出生地。
description.en: An area in New Kowloon, Hong Kong, and the birthplace of Johnnie To.

description.zh-cn: 杜琪峰曾就读的小学之一。
description.en: One of the primary schools that Johnnie To attended.

description.zh-cn: 杜琪峰曾就读的小学之一。
description.en: One of the primary schools that Johnnie To attended.

description.zh-cn: 香港的免费无线电视台，杜琪峰在此开始其职业生涯。
description.en: A free-to-air television broadcaster in Hong Kong where Johnnie To began his career.

description.zh-cn: 香港资深戏剧教育家、导演、演员。他录取了杜琪峰进入无线电视艺员训练班。
description.en: A veteran Hong Kong drama educator, director, and actor. He admitted Johnnie To to the TVB artist training program.

description.zh-cn: 香港传媒人，曾任无线电视制作部总监。他赏识并提拔了杜琪峰。
description.en: A Hong Kong media professional and former head of production at TVB. He recognized and promoted Johnnie To.

description.zh-cn: 香港著名导演，是杜琪峰在电视台时期的导师。
description.en: A renowned Hong Kong director who was a mentor to Johnnie To during his time at the television station.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员，他推荐杜琪峰执导了其首部电影。
description.en: A Hong Kong actor who recommended Johnnie To to direct his first film.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影公司，杜琪峰于1986年开始在此执导多部电影。
description.en: A Hong Kong film production company where Johnnie To began directing several films in 1986.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影编剧、导演、监制，与杜琪峰共同创立了银河映像。
description.en: A Hong Kong screenwriter, director, and producer who co-founded Milkyway Image with Johnnie To.

description.zh-cn: 由杜琪峰和韦家辉于1996年组成的香港电影制作公司，以制作具个人风格的电影而著称。
description.en: A Hong Kong film production company founded by Johnnie To and Wai Ka-fai in 1996, known for producing films with a distinctive personal style.

en: Government of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政当局。
description.en: The governing authority of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一个社交媒体平台。
description.en: A social media platform in China.

description.zh-cn: 日本电影导演，对杜琪峰的电影创作产生了深远影响。
description.en: A Japanese film director who profoundly influenced Johnnie To's filmmaking.

description.zh-cn: 香港武侠电影导演，杜琪峰对其推崇备至。
description.en: A Hong Kong martial arts film director highly admired by Johnnie To.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员、歌手，是杜琪峰的长期合作伙伴之一。
description.en: A Hong Kong actor and singer, and one of Johnnie To's long-term collaborators.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演，其首部挂名执导的电影《天若有情》大部分场面由监制杜琪峰实际执导。
description.en: A Hong Kong film director whose debut credited film 'A Moment of Romance' was mostly directed by its producer, Johnnie To.

description.zh-cn: 杜琪峰出生于香港新九龙深水埗通州街。
description.en: Johnnie To was born on Tung Chau Street, Sham Shui Po, New Kowloon, Hong Kong.

position.zh-cn: 艺员训练班学员、制作助理、编导
position.en: Artist Training Class Trainee, Production Assistant, Director

description.zh-cn: 1974年入读无线电视艺员训练班，毕业后转任幕后，从制作助理升至编导，约1979年离开。
description.en: He enrolled in the TVB artist training class in 1974, and after graduation, he worked behind the scenes, rising from production assistant to director, leaving around 1979.

description.zh-cn: 录取杜琪峰入读香港无线电视艺员训练班。
description.en: Admitted Johnnie To to the Hong Kong TVB artist training program.

description.zh-cn: 赏识杜琪峰并将其由制作助理提拔为编导，杜琪峰视其为伯乐。
description.en: Recognized Johnnie To's talent and promoted him from production assistant to director; To considers him a mentor.

description.zh-cn: 王天林赏识杜琪峰，并教导其节目制作知识，是其导师。
description.en: Wong Tin-lam appreciated Johnnie To and taught him program production knowledge, acting as his mentor.

description.zh-cn: 于1979至1980年间推荐杜琪峰执导其首部电影《碧水寒山夺命金》。
description.en: Between 1979 and 1980, he recommended Johnnie To to direct his debut film, 'The Enigmatic Case'.

description.zh-cn: 1986年受邀到新艺城拍摄电影，执导了《开心鬼撞鬼》、《八星报喜》等多部作品。
description.en: In 1986, he was invited to work at Cinema City, where he directed several films, including 'Happy Ghost III' and 'The Eighth Happiness'.

description.zh-cn: 与韦家辉于1996年共同组建了银河映像。
description.en: Co-founded Milkyway Image with Wai Ka-fai in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 与杜琪峰于1996年共同组建了银河映像。
description.en: Co-founded Milkyway Image with Johnnie To in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 2023年在柏林影展记者会上发表关于电影与极权、自由的言论，被指影射中国政府为独裁政府，引发争议并疑似遭到内地官方封杀。
description.en: In February 2023, at a press conference at the Berlin Film Festival, he made remarks about cinema, totalitarianism, and freedom, which were interpreted as implying the Chinese government is a dictatorship. This sparked controversy and led to a suspected official ban in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 在杜琪峰于柏林影展发表争议言论后，其在新浪微博上的粉丝帐号遭到封锁。
description.en: After Johnnie To's controversial remarks at the Berlin Film Festival, his fan accounts on Sina Weibo were blocked.

description.zh-cn: 杜琪峰十分欣赏黑泽明，称其对自己影响最大，并在电影《柔道龙虎榜》片末打上“献给黑泽明”。
description.en: Johnnie To greatly admires Akira Kurosawa, stating he was his biggest influence, and dedicated his film 'Throw Down' to him.

description.zh-cn: 杜琪峰对胡金铨崇拜有加，认为其发展了亚洲文化。
description.en: Johnnie To deeply admires King Hu, believing that he developed Asian culture.

description.zh-cn: 杜琪峰与刘德华是长期合作的伙伴，刘德华经常担任其电影主角，合作作品包括《天若有情》、《暗战》、《孤男寡女》、《瘦身男女》、《盲探》等。
description.en: Johnnie To and Andy Lau are long-term collaborators, with Lau often starring in his films, including 'A Moment of Romance', 'Running on Karma', 'Needing You...', 'Love on a Diet', 'Blind Detective', and others.

description.zh-cn: 在电影《天若有情》中，陈木胜为挂名导演，而监制杜琪峰执导了大部分场面。
description.en: For the film 'A Moment of Romance', Benny Chan was the credited director, while producer Johnnie To directed most of the scenes.
